name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $use
desc: Returns: The purpose of this address.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: Distinguishes between physical addresses (those you can visit) and mailing addresses (e.g. PO Boxes and care-of addresses). Most addresses are both.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Distinguishes between physical addresses (those you can visit) and mailing addresses (e.g. PO Boxes and care-of addresses). Most addresses are both.

name: $text
desc: Returns: A full text representation of the address.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A full text representation of the address.

name: $line
desc: Returns: This component contains the house number, apartment number, street name, street direction,  P.O. Box number, delivery hints, and similar address information.

name: $addline
desc: This component contains the house number, apartment number, street name, street direction,  P.O. Box number, delivery hints, and similar address information.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: This component contains the house number, apartment number, street name, street direction,  P.O. Box number, delivery hints, and similar address information.

name: $city
desc: Returns: The name of the city, town, village or other community or delivery center.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The name of the city, town, village or other community or delivery center.

name: $district
desc: Returns: The name of the administrative area (county).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The name of the administrative area (county).

name: $state
desc: Returns: Sub-unit of a country with limited sovereignty in a federally organized country. A code may be used if codes are in common use (i.e. US 2 letter state codes).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Sub-unit of a country with limited sovereignty in a federally organized country. A code may be used if codes are in common use (i.e. US 2 letter state codes).

name: $postalCode
desc: Returns: A postal code designating a region defined by the postal service.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A postal code designating a region defined by the postal service.

name: $country
desc: Returns: Country - a nation as commonly understood or generally accepted.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Country - a nation as commonly understood or generally accepted.

name: $period
desc: Returns: Time period when address was/is in use.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Time period when address was/is in use.
